wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Montague Grigg  (born 6 July 1959) is a British businessman. He was formerly the chief executive of The British Land Company plc, a British property development and investment company.

response: BAE Systems' chairman is Sir Roger Carr. The executive directors are Charles Woodburn (CEO), Brad Greve and Tom Arsenault. The non-executive directors are Chris Grigg, Ewan Kirk, Ian Tyler, Nicole Piasecki, Stephen Pearce, Jane Griffiths, Nick Anderson, Carolyn Fairbairn, Crystal E. Ashby, and Elizabeth Corley.
